body.description: Protect your hair from daily wear and tear with Dove Ultra Daily Moisture Concentrate Conditioner for dry hair. Dove Ultra Daily Moisture Concentrate Shampoo and Conditioner system moisturizes and smoothes hair in 30 seconds, detangling and improving manageability. Using only half your usual dose, this ultra-fast detangle concentrated hair conditioner formula efficiently penetrates hair strands and delivers moisture to transform dry hair. This dry hair conditioner contains 100 percent more Moisture Actives per concentrate drop and uses less plastic per wash*. The conditioner for dry hair gently conditions hair with its mild, nourishing formula, leaving you with the look and feel of soft and silky hair. As part of the Dove Daily Moisture range, this Dove conditioner is formulated with Bio-Nourish Complex, which helps to smooth hair on the outside while deeply and progressively nourishing it from within. With regular use, this Dove Ultra Daily Moisture Concentrate Conditioner helps to make hair look and feel healthier in the long run. With every wash, it instantly detangles hair, improving manageability and leaving you with the appearance of soft and silky hair. How to use the Dove Daily Moisture System: Step 1: Squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that's enough) and massage the gel-like shampoo in wet hair. Step 2: After shampooing, squeeze ONLY HALF of your usual dose (yes, that’s enough) and massage the gel-like conditioner as usual in wet hair. Step 3: Rinse and experience hair that looks and feels soft and silky.*vs. non-concentrated Daily Moisture 20.4oz.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo is a deeply nourishing shampoo to help give you silky and cared for hair, every day. This shampoo for dry hair nourishes hair from within, making it smooth, soft, and manageable.

Dove Daily Moisture Collection Dove is dedicated to providing superior nourishment solutions for hair. We create products with two-way care for instant and long term results. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Pro-Moisture Complex This complex deeply nourishes your hair from within, hydrating and protecting so hair is more damage resistant. Dove Care Goes Beyond Your Hair This conditioner is certified cruelty-free by PETA and the bottle is recyclable and made from recycled plastics.

Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner Dove Nutritive Solutions Daily Moisture Conditioner for dry hair nourishes hair from within, making it smooth, soft, manageable. Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Shampoo Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo, with Keratin Repair Actives, helps to nourish hair, leaving it visibly repaired. Dove Nutritive Solutions Intensive Repair Conditioner Formulated with Keratin Repair Actives, Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner restores the appearance of damage on the surface of your hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my hair softer & smoother, does leave noticeable scent on my scalp.
reviews.reviewText: Overall I would say that this Dove Hair Conditioner has helped make my hair less dry and more soft. My hair tends to be dry and frizzy after just washing with just shampoo. This conditioner has helped my hair by making it softer and smoother (less dry and less frizzy). I usually shampoo my hair and rinse off the shampoo soap. Then I apply the Dove conditioner to my hair and spread the conditioner with a little water, and let it sit for about 5 minutes. Afterwards I try to rinse off the conditioner with warm water. This is somewhat difficult to do and I notice that there is a noticeable Dove conditioner scent left on my scalp despite rigorous rinsing with water. However, my hair is softer and smoother. I guess this is the trade-off. A lightly scented hair conditioner might help with reducing the residual scent. Overall, I am satisfied with the results and I would recommend this Dove conditioner especially for its reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best condition I've used
reviews.reviewText: This is by far my favorite conditioner. I wish I could find it in store but I can't, so that's why I bought it on here. It's almost comparable to salon grade conditioner but half the price. Leaves my hair super smooth and smells really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this shampoo and conditioner it makes my hair so soft and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need only very little
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. Makes my hair super softs. I just wish the bottle was a little bigger for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for highlighted curly hair
reviews.reviewText: I have highlighted curly hair below my shoulders and this balm is now a lifesaver for me. It's so hard to find a good conditioner for hair like mine that gets tangled all the time and can't be combed after washing, yes it moisturizes the hair, but I also use a leave-in conditioner on the ends to organize my curls. It is thicker than other balms, and I use only a small amount, and the price is absolutely amazing for such excellent quality, haha. Thanks a lot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The shampoo and conditioner both smell great and leave hair soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smells is overwhelming and masculine
reviews.reviewText: Smell is too strong and masculine. Hair feels great after use, but I can’t get past the smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
